### Introduction

#### *Day-1 (26th Sept)*

My first piece of R code



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1
✔ ggplot2   3.5.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.0.2     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggformula)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Loading required package: scales

Attaching package: 'scales'

The following object is masked from 'package:purrr':

    discard

The following object is masked from 'package:readr':

    col_factor

Loading required package: ggridges

New to ggformula?  Try the tutorials: 
	learnr::run_tutorial("introduction", package = "ggformula")
	learnr::run_tutorial("refining", package = "ggformula")
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(babynames)
```
:::



List of babynames



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 1,924,665 × 5
    year sex   name          n   prop
   <dbl> <chr> <chr>     <int>  <dbl>
 1  1880 F     Mary       7065 0.0724
 2  1880 F     Anna       2604 0.0267
 3  1880 F     Emma       2003 0.0205
 4  1880 F     Elizabeth  1939 0.0199
 5  1880 F     Minnie     1746 0.0179
 6  1880 F     Margaret   1578 0.0162
 7  1880 F     Ida        1472 0.0151
 8  1880 F     Alice      1414 0.0145
 9  1880 F     Bertha     1320 0.0135
10  1880 F     Sarah      1288 0.0132
# ℹ 1,924,655 more rows
```


:::
:::



Searching for my name in the list



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name == "Anusha")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 28 × 5
    year sex   name       n       prop
   <dbl> <chr> <chr>  <int>      <dbl>
 1  1988 F     Anusha     5 0.0000026 
 2  1991 F     Anusha    10 0.00000492
 3  1992 F     Anusha    11 0.00000549
 4  1993 F     Anusha    11 0.00000558
 5  1994 F     Anusha    10 0.00000513
 6  1995 F     Anusha    13 0.00000677
 7  1996 F     Anusha    17 0.00000887
 8  1997 F     Anusha    28 0.0000147 
 9  1998 F     Anusha    42 0.0000217 
10  1999 F     Anusha    52 0.0000267 
# ℹ 18 more rows
```


:::
:::



Graph for my name



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name == "Anusha") %>% 
  gf_line(n ~ year)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



Searching for a name which can be spelled differently like Sara and Sarah.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name == "Sara" | name == "Sarah")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 487 × 5
    year sex   name      n      prop
   <dbl> <chr> <chr> <int>     <dbl>
 1  1880 F     Sarah  1288 0.0132   
 2  1880 F     Sara    165 0.00169  
 3  1881 F     Sarah  1226 0.0124   
 4  1881 F     Sara    147 0.00149  
 5  1882 F     Sarah  1410 0.0122   
 6  1882 F     Sara    180 0.00156  
 7  1883 F     Sarah  1359 0.0113   
 8  1883 F     Sara    183 0.00152  
 9  1883 M     Sarah     7 0.0000622
10  1884 F     Sarah  1518 0.0110   
# ℹ 477 more rows
```


:::
:::



Graph



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name == "Sara" | name == "Sarah") %>% 
  gf_line(n ~ year)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



Searching for my friend's name



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name == "Shruti")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 42 × 5
    year sex   name       n       prop
   <dbl> <chr> <chr>  <int>      <dbl>
 1  1974 F     Shruti     5 0.00000319
 2  1975 F     Shruti     9 0.00000577
 3  1976 F     Shruti     6 0.00000382
 4  1979 F     Shruti     8 0.00000464
 5  1980 F     Shruti     6 0.00000337
 6  1981 F     Shruti    10 0.00000559
 7  1982 F     Shruti    12 0.00000662
 8  1983 F     Shruti     9 0.00000503
 9  1984 F     Shruti    13 0.00000721
10  1985 F     Shruti     6 0.00000325
# ℹ 32 more rows
```


:::
:::



Graph



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
babynames %>% filter(name == "Shruti") %>% 
  gf_line(n ~ year)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
